thread.title: Top U.S. Officials Have Spoken Directly With Kim Jong Un to Set Up Summit

author: Rebecca Ballhaus
title: Top U.S. Officials Have Spoken Directly With Kim Jong Un to Set Up Summit
text:
President Donald Trump said Wednesday he recently sent Central Intelligence Agency Director Mike Pompeo on a secret trip to meet with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Pyongyang, in an effort to set up a summit between the two leaders.
Mr. Pompeo, tapped by Mr. Trump last month to serve as secretary of state, met with Mr. Kim to discuss terms of a meeting aimed at ending North Koreaâ€™s nuclear-weapons program. 

The... RELATED VIDEO What Could Go Wrong at a Trump-Kim Summit? A meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un could be a diplomatic breakthrough, but both men are nothing if not unpredictable.
